div.bibl: Scrapbook, Vol. II of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago,I11. CONCERT GIVEN UNDER AUSPICES OF UNION OF RUSSIAN ORGANIZATIONS OF CHICAGO

body.p: This organization gave a concert on January 27, 1923, at the West End Auditorium, Taylor and Racine. P. Kozlov, and Serg Borovakii (of Moscow Opera) sang. There were Russian dances also.
